Text:
I wish Jorrell (knighty) would get the audio right.
2ch stereo just doesn't cut it when the audio is actually 6ch Dolby Digital.
If it's a downmixing situation when he's outputting the file please correct that.
The audio is just as important as the hd video.

do appreciate the effort.
is the race file have the Intro and Post race content!
2ch it may be but hey it's 50fps!
Its not SkyHD rip! and not English! and don't have Intro and post race! Where is the SKYRIP footy?

just to clarify everything

both qualifying AND the race are in fact from skysportsHD and the both have 6 channel sky commentary english audio (select audio stream 3 in media player classic), 2 channel sky commentary english audio (stream 2) and 2 channel russian audio (stream 1)

they both do not have intros nor post stuff

but the quality is AWESOME
